title: Believe
quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

title: Blessed
quote: We all want to win more, but it's all about being blessed and embracing your blessings. We have life.
author: DJ Khaled

title: I can do
quote: There is no man living that can not do more than he thinks he can.
author: Henry Ford

title: Strong
quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
author: Nelson Mandela

title: Persistence
quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

title: Positive
quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
author: Dalai Lama
